sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM config WHERE projectId = #projectId# ORDER BY seq, id
SELECT i.* FROM config c inner join config_instance i on c.id = i.configId WHERE c.projectId = #projectId# AND i.envId = #envId# ORDER BY c.seq, c.id
SELECT * FROM config_instance WHERE configId = #configId# AND envId = #envId# AND contextmd5 = #contextmd5#

SELECT a.* FROM config_instance a WHERE a.configId = #configId# AND a.envId = #envId# AND ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM config_instance b WHERE a.configId = b.configId AND a.envId = b.envId AND a.seq < b.seq ) < #max# ORDER BY a.seq DESC
SELECT i.* FROM config c inner join config_instance i on c.id = i.configId WHERE c.projectId = #projectId# AND i.envId = #envId# AND i.context = '' ORDER BY c.seq, c.id
SELECT DISTINCT c.id FROM config c inner join config_instance i on c.id = i.configId WHERE c.projectId = #projectId# AND i.envId = #envId#
SELECT DISTINCT c.id FROM config c inner join config_instance i on c.id = i.configId WHERE c.projectId = #projectId# AND i.envId = #envId# AND i.context <> ''
SELECT s.* FROM config c inner join config_status s on c.id = s.configId WHERE c.projectId = #projectId# AND s.envId = #envId#
SELECT c.* FROM config c INNER JOIN config_status s ON c.id = s.configId WHERE c.projectId = #projectId# AND s.envId = #envId# AND s.`status` = #foreffctive#
SELECT c2.* FROM config c1 INNER JOIN config c2 ON c1.projectId = c2.projectId WHERE c1.id = #configId# AND c2.seq > c1.seq ORDER BY c2.seq, c2.id LIMIT 1
SELECT MAX(seq) FROM config WHERE projectId = #projectId#
SELECT MAX(seq) FROM config_instance WHERE configId = #configId# AND envId = #envId#
SELECT c2.* FROM config c1 INNER JOIN config c2 ON c1.projectId = c2.projectId WHERE c1.id = #configId# AND c2.seq < c1.seq ORDER BY c2.seq desc, c2.id desc LIMIT 1
sqlMap.update: UPDATE config SET `desc` = #desc#, type = #type#, modifyUserId = #modifyUserId#, modifyTime = #modifyTime#, seq = #seq# WHERE id = #id#
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO config(`key`, `desc`, type, projectId, createUserId, modifyUserId, createTime, modifyTime, seq) VALUES(#key#, #desc#, #type#, #projectId#, #createUserId#, #modifyUserId#, NOW(), NOW(), #seq#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID

INSERT INTO config_instance(configId, envId, value, context, contextmd5, createUserId, modifyUserId, createTime, modifyTime, `desc`, seq) VALUES(#configId#, #envId#, #value#, #context#, #contextmd5#, #createUserId#, #modifyUserId#, NOW(), NOW(), #desc#, #seq#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID

INSERT INTO config_status(configId, envId, `status`, activeTime) VALUES(#configId#, #envId#, #status#, #activeTime#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
sqlMap.update: UPDATE config_status SET `status` = #status# WHERE configId = #configId# AND envId = #envId#
UPDATE config_status SET `status` = #status#, activeTime = #activeTime# WHERE configId = #configId# AND envId = #envId#
UPDATE config_instance SET value = #value#, context = #context#, contextmd5 = #contextmd5#, modifyUserId = #modifyUserId#, modifyTime = #modifyTime#, `desc` = #desc#, seq = #seq# WHERE id = #id#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM config_instance WHERE configId = #configId# AND envId = #envId#
DELETE FROM config_status WHERE configId = #configId# AND envId = #envId#
